pullrequest.title: My first commit: started fixing a bug in LinkInspector!

content.raw:
Thanks for the contribution, this works for me!

We could also backport this to release branch `gazebo7` and merge it forward to `gazebo8` and `gazebo9` from there, so that the fix goes into the next minor/patch releases. This PR is targeted at `default`, which will become Gazebo 10 in January 2019.
content.html:
Thanks for the contribution, this works for me!

We could also backport this to release branch gazebo7 and merge it forward to gazebo8 and gazebo9 from there, so that the fix goes into the next minor/patch releases. This PR is targeted at default, which will become Gazebo 10 in January 2019.
